metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, 21st Century Schizoid Man is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: 21st Century Schizoid Man has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Minor,  and C Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
